document.full_text: a fire on monday killed at least 17 people in a building crowded with migrant workers on the fringe of beijing and the government vowed to track down those responsible for the blaze in what one official said was an illegal building.
document.title: beijing blaze kills 17 in "illegal" building
lines_and_colors: a fire on monday killed at least 17 people in a building crowded with migrant workers on the fringe of beijing and the government vowed to track down those responsible for the blaze in what one official said was an illegal building.
